scripts.start: npm run clean && mkdir dist && cp -r img dist && cp -r audio dist && cp -r fonts dist && cp favicon.ico dist && parcel index.html
scripts.build-dev: npm run clean && mkdir dist && cp -r img dist && cp -r audio dist && cp -r fonts dist && cp favicon.ico dist && parcel build index.html
scripts.build: npm run clean && mkdir dist && cp -r img dist && cp -r audio dist && cp -r fonts dist && cp favicon.ico dist && parcel build index.html --no-source-maps
